title: The Jam - Direction Reaction Creation / 5CD Box Set
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“A police car and a screaming siren 
A pneumatic drill and ripped up concrete 
A baby wailing and stray dog howling 
The screech of brakes and lamp light blinking 
That's entertainment.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½


Direction Reaction Creation is the most comprehensive Jam collection, 
it contains all of their single A- and B-sides, every cut from their six albums, and every non-album EP track they recorded; 
117 tracks, 22 of those previously unreleased or rare, 
essentially the band's complete studio recordings.



The Jam
